arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Sunderland – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will put the Premier League’s current longest unbeaten run on the line when they host a confident Sunderland side at Selhurst Park on Saturday. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will look to continue their impressive recent form when they return to action at Selhurst Park on Saturday, putting the Premier League’s longest active unbeaten streak on the line. Oliver Glasner’s side will be in high spirits following an impressive 3-0 victory at Aston Villa before the international break. arts.ttl: Sunderland XI vs Crystal Palace – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland’s impressive start to life back in the Premier League faces its sternest test yet with a trip to Selhurst Park on Saturday. The Black Cats have defied expectations by winning two of their first three matches, but now face in-form Crystal Palace. arts.ttl: Starting XI: Two changes predicted for Sunderland versus Palace
arts.sum: Regis Le Bris sprang a bit of a surprise last time out by leaving out Simon Adingra to get Enzo Le Fee back into the team – and it was a decision that paid dividends, with Enzo turning in a man-of-the-match display. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Sunderland: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4, 2025
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will play their first Saturday 3pm game of the season hosting Sunderland at Selhurst Park on Saturday afternoon. Sunderland have played four games this season with two league wins at the Stadium of Light against West Ham and Brentford.
